pullRequest.title: DHFPROD-4519: Inherit from "data-hub-module-reader" role
pullRequest.bodyText: Removed try/catch now that data-hub-explorer-architect can access the job-info data service.

commit.message: DHFPROD-4519: Inherit from "data-hub-module-reader" role to access data service

nodes.bodyText: Do we have test for this in place?

I think the client should just call JobInfo then - there's no point in having this additional layer to go through. If we did keep it, I think we'd want the method names to be the same - i.e. the Manager method should be getLatestJobData.
